Author: pourange
Text: Eyyy, wrestler here. I can't restrict for longer than a few days at a time until my performance rapidly tanks.

Author: sassygillie
Text: I do! I’ve had conversations with my coaches and captains so they know about my ED. We’ve come to an agreement that if I’ve had a bad day (wasn’t able to eat much), I would come to practice and just do as much as I felt comfortable doing. On my end, I have to eat before tournaments otherwise I’m not allowed to play (and I’m usually pretty honest with them about this because I love playing)
